meanings.definition: Resembling a map in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The intricate design of the garden was so maplike, with paths winding around like rivers on a map.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle pieces fit together perfectly, creating a maplike image of a castle.
meanings.sent3: The maplike pattern on the tablecloth made it look like a treasure map for ants.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maplike maze, full of twists and turns that led to different memories.
meanings.sent5: The maplike constellation of stars in the sky guided the lost travelers back home.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a map.
meanings.sent1: The maplike instructions were easy to follow, leading them straight to the hidden cave.
meanings.sent2: His maplike memory never failed him, always able to recall every detail of the events.
meanings.sent3: The maplike layout of the board game made it feel like they were exploring a new world.
meanings.sent4: Her maplike sense of direction always amazed her friends, never getting lost in unfamiliar places.
meanings.sent5: The maplike organization of the library made it simple to find any book within minutes.
